alert.note: Alert for Athens; Morgan; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 2:41PM EDT until April 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washington County in southeastern Ohio... Eastern Morgan County in southeastern Ohio... Central Athens County in southeastern Ohio... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 241 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Athens, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Beverly, Chesterhill, Lowell, Stockport, Bristol, Amesville, Stroud Run State Park, Hackney, Bartlett and Devola. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 7 and 9. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
